Question.Subject: Is Lockerz for real? Does Lockerz.com call you on your first redeem?
Question.Content:
I am an international user and I had to enter my phone number on my Lockerz.com account creation. Now... I didn't really entered my valid phone number.... do they have to call you in order to get your prize?
Thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer: its 100% legit. hard to believe i know but youtube lockerz and watch the hundreds of videos of people opening prizes. and no they dont call you EVER

Answer.Content: its 100% legit. hard to believe i know but youtube lockerz and watch the hundreds of videos of people opening prizes. and no they dont call you EVER
